Description:
Responsibilities:Technically competent and ability to use engineering judgment independently to determine solutions
Prepare Design Drawings and calculations
Prepare Technical Reports and contractual documents of acceptable technical and presentational quality with minimum guidance.
Apply new ideas/digital idea to improve solutions and processes to improve efficiency.
Receive on the job technical training through performing tasks with minimum supervision.
Responsible for completion of specifically assigned tasks to time and cost.
Supporting and mentoring, with the possibility of formal line management responsibilities.
Opportunity to present your project work at company meetings or at conferences.Skills
Skills:
A sound understanding of mechanical engineering principles and their application in (HVAC, Plumbing, Fire Fighting) and pumping stations.
Able to work as a reliable and proactive member of the team, able to apply knowledge gained.
Able to work on several projects, and to communicate clearly with a range of people, including making presentations. Flexible and enthusiastic; team player.
Conversant with MS Office tools.
Experience working on MENA projects is a must.
Good knowledge of work procedures and ensuring work adheres to procedures.
5-10 years of experience, in the production of design documentations and drawings including optioneering reports and specifications of mechanical systems.
Experience in producing design calculations of mechanical systems for (HVAC, Plumbing, Fire Fighting).
Familiar with working to design national and international codes as well as standards appropriate for (HVAC, Plumbing, Fire Fighting) industry.
Ability to produce hydraulic calculations for mechanical equipment, equipment datasheets/specifications and schedules.
He/she should be conversant with various (HVAC, Plumbing, Fire Fighting) mechanical equipment
Pipe and Duct sizing calculations, pump sizing calculations, tanks calculations, cooling loads calculations, static pressure calculations.
General Arrangement drawings for piping and mechanical equipment. Isometric drawings. P&IDs, PFDs etc.
Software - AutoCAD, Revit, HAP, Elite are essential and should have working knowledge of 3D Models etc such as Navis works.
Excellent communication and listening skills.
Should be flexible and positive attitude.
Writing professional reports.
Identifies and communicates concerns to immediate Supervisor.
Discusses career goals and aspirations.
Able to draft responses to straight forward queries
Acts in best interest of the team at all times.
Being able to adjust to changing priorities
Willingness to share information and knowledge with team members
Willing to participate and contribute to company social activities
Displays appropriate levels of assertiveness.
